title: FS:  Batch of T3 Turkey Reds
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS:  Batch of T3 Turkey Reds
posts.post_content:
Hello All,

Here is the list.  Let me know if you see anything you like.  Happy Holidays!

Happy to send scans and/or descriptions. Many of these cards are stellar for their technical grade.  Feel free to make offers!

HOFers,etc:
Bresnahan  PSA-4  $650
Crawford  PSA-4 $600
Chase  PSA-4 $550
Chase PSA -5MK  $425
Clarke  PSA-2 $400
Cobb PSA-1 $2000
Griffith  PSA-4 $600
Griffith -raw $225
Jennings  PSA-4.5  $950
Waddell  PSA-4  $950
Young  PSA-2 $1100
Dool"in"  PSA-1.5  $800
Wallace  PSA-4  $650

Commons:
PSA 5:  $725 each - Devlin, Doyle, McIntyre (Brooklyn), Smith (2), Street

SGC60: $725 - McBride

PSA 4.5 - $600 - Jordan & Herzog
PSA 4.5 - $550 each - Mullin

PSA 4: $450 - Jordan & Herzog
PSA 4: $425 each - Bell, Burns, Graham, Hoblitzell, Manning, Paskert (Cin)
PSA 4: $400 each - Bergen, Devlin, Mullin, Pfeister (2), Rucker, Thomas

PSA 4MK  - $275 each - Overall (no-ad), Out at Third
PSA 4MK - $250 each - Dahlen, Jordan, McIntyre (Det)

PSA 3.5 - $325 - Browne

PSA 3 - $325 each - Leach (no-ad), Jordan & Herzog
PSA 3 - $300 - Camnitz
PSA 3 - $275 each - McConnell, Overall, Criger, Downey, Hofman, Moran
PSA 3MK - $250 A Close Play at Second

PSA 2.5 - $250 Hoblitzell

PSA 2 - $225 Jordan & Herzog, $175 Doyle

PSA 1: $90 each - Dooin

RAW:  $175 -Trying to Catch him Napping, $150-Leach, $125-Mullin, $125-Dahlen (poss trim)

T9 Boxers:
58. McFarland HOFer - VGEX $225
58. McFarland PSA-3 $200
59. Murphy VGEX $175
62. Gardner G (crease o/w EX) $75
66. Brown EX $275
68. Jeannette HOFer PSA 2.5 $250
75. O'Brien HOFer p/h o/w EX $100 


Thanks much,
Craig
PM sent on Griffith and Waddell PSA 4's.  Thanks.
